channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Big Short’ investor Michael Burry revives his short bet against Tesla, calling the stock ‘ridiculously overvalued’
item.description: Burry first shorted Tesla in 2021 but exited the trade months later.

item.title: Who is Kevin Hassett? The rumored Fed pick says inflation is ‘way down,’ sees ‘political bias’ in jobs data, and suggested firing Powell over a renovation
item.description: “If you’d asked me a year ago, I would have said I think Kevin would be a good pick. I wouldn’t say that today. Kevin has been incredibly dishonest.”

item.title: New FDA-approved glasses can slow nearsightedness in kids
item.description: While the technology has previously been available in Europe, Asia and other parts of the world, it’s now rolling out in the U.S.

item.title: How a park bench meeting led to Aflac’s $200 million mascot idea
item.description: “Quack, quack, Aflac became the idea,” CEO Dan Amos told Fortune. The adoption of the avian mascot has coincided with a 621% run-up in share price.

item.title: Bitcoin takes another plunge, chances of reclaiming $100,000 by year end drop to 24% on prediction markets
item.description: Bettors on Kalshi are putting their money on bearish positions.

item.title: Bank of Japan’s Ueda rattles global bond markets with prospect of rate hike
Elon Musk offers two non-Tesla stock picks to play the future of AI
Will bitcoin keep dropping? This analyst sees a turnaround as soon as Tuesday.
Dow ends over 400 points lower to start December as stocks snap 5-day win streak
Dow leading stocks lower in final hour as December starts with pullback — live
